content.text: What's your favorite thing to do for fun?
I love to travel and experience new things. I'm also a big reader.
That's awesome! What are some of your favorite places you've traveled to?
I've been to a lot of places, but my favorite is probably Japan. I love the culture and the food.
I've never been to Japan, but it's definitely on my list! I've heard great things about the food.
It's amazing! You have to try the sushi.
I definitely will! What about books? Do you have any favorite authors?
I love so many authors, but my favorites are probably Brene Brown and Malcolm Gladwell.
I love Brene Brown! I haven't read any Malcolm Gladwell, but I've heard good things.
You should definitely check him out! He's a great writer.
I will! What kind of books do you like to read?
I read a lot of nonfiction, but I also love a good historical fiction novel.
Me too! I'm always looking for new books to read.
I have a lot of great recommendations if you're ever looking for something new.
